Legal_Issue: Was the member's decision to deny the reopening of the refugee claim reasonable?
Procedural_Context: Judicial review application filed under IRPA, challenging the denial of a request to reopen a refugee claim.
Legal_Provision: subsection 72(1) of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Key_Factor_in_Determination: Applicant's failure to meet filing deadlines
Application_Error: Failure to submit the Basis of Claim form within required timeframe
Application_Factor: Access to legal counsel and interpreter
Decision_Outcome: Denial of request to reopen refugee claim upheld
Decision_Review_Issue: Reasonableness of decision to deny reopening
Governing_Rule_or_Provision: subsection 72(1) of the Immigration and Refugee Protection Act
Cause_of_Refusal: Applicant's failure to meet filing deadlines led to abandonment of the refugee claim
Procedural_Issue: Failure to comply with filing deadlines
Omission_Type: Failure to submit Basis of Claim form on time
